title: Cowboy

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Select a player to Lasso at night. The Lassoed status lasts for this night and the next night.
- If a Lassoed player is investigated or roleblocked at night, you will shoot them.
- If you shoot an innocent player, you lose Lasso privileges.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Investigation is any action that reveals attributes of a player that is not public info yet. (Will, role, role number, who they visited)

desc:
Post 3459
*In a wild-west themed trio with the sheriff and the outlaw*
